about.details: From humble startups to software embraced by millions, I've found joy and purpose in designing experiences that resonate with people. At Teraflow, I have the privilege of leading a stellar team, designing AI & data-driven digital products that push the boundaries of generative AI. Prior to this, I served as department head, leading the development of online and banking app at Barclays, led a team of UX designers at Momentum, and spent several years traversing the globe while working remotely. Join me as I continue to navigate the tech landscape, sharing insights and learnings gathered along the way.
